name: The Great Gatsby
overview:
The Great Gatsby for NES was a flash game released in the mid 2010s that was staged as a sort of "found media" where the website claimed to have found a prototype at a garage sale. In reality, it was just a flash game with NES-like graphics that paid homage to the platformers of the time.

After years of fans asking homebrewers to port the game to play on a real NES, in 2022, the website was updated with a download link to play the game on real NES hardware.
